category.name: Validation Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ValidationMasterFormColumnPreferences
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of property names to be displayed as columns in the ValidationMasterForm table. Valid Values: validation_target validation_name validation_application validation_utility_name validation_user validation_date result_state_flag validation_result override_to_state override_request_state
